title: Big Data Quarterly Names Syncsort One of the Top 50 Companies Driving Big Data Innovation
text:
Award Win Highlights Syncsort’s Leadership Position across the Big Data Landscape
Syncsort , a global leader in Big Data software, today announced that Big Data Quarterly, a new magazine and digital resource, from the editors of Database Trends and Applications (DBTA) magazine, selected the Company as a part of its Big Data 50 , which recognizes 50 forward-thinking companies that are expanding the ways to derive value from data.
The editorial team at Big Data Quarterly recognized Syncsort alongside several partners including Cloudera, Dell, Hortonworks, MapR and Splunk as Big Data leaders enabling organizations to collect, analyze and gain actionable insight from data. Syncsort was lauded for its Big Data solutions that help solve customers’ toughest Big Data integration challenges and remove major barriers to mainstream Apache Hadoop adoption.
Syncsort’s DMX data integration software insulates customers from changes in the rapidly-evolving Big Data solutions ecosystem with a “design once, deploy anywhere” architecture that runs seamlessly on multiple compute frameworks across Apache Hadoop, Linux, and Windows, both on-premise and in the Cloud. Syncsort also drives continuous innovation through regular contributions to the Apache open source projects, including their recent contribution of an IBM zSystems mainframe connector for Spark Packages .
“With the variety and volume of data emanating from traditional sources as well as a host of new ones, it’s no longer business as usual,” said Tom Hogan, group publisher of Big Data Quarterly and Database Trends and Applications. “New data management approaches, such as those offered by Syncsort, are attractive ways to handle the growing data influx, helping organizations navigate the rapidly changing big data landscape.”
This isn’t the first time Syncsort’s Big Data solutions have garnered recognition from DBTA. Recently, the company was named to the DBTA 100 list of companies that matter most in data, as well as its list of Trend-Setting Products in Data and Information Management for 2015 .
“We pride ourselves in helping organizations overcome their Big Data integration, migration and transformation challenges,” said Tendü Yourtçu, general manager of Syncsort’s Big Data business. “Receiving additional recognition from Big Data Quarterly illustrates our commitment to providing data-intensive organizations with a smarter way to collect and process the ever-expanding flow of data and accelerate time to value with Hadoop, Spark and related Big Data technologies.”
Syncsort provides secure, powerful Big Data software that gives businesses the tools necessary to support the rapid delivery of information and turn it into valuable company insights. For more information on Syncsort’s Big Data products, visit: http://www.syncsort.com/en/Products/BigData .
About Syncsort
Syncsort provides enterprise software that allows organizations to collect, integrate, sort and distribute more data in less time, with fewer resources and lower costs. Syncsort software provides specialized solutions spanning "Big Iron to Big Data," including next gen analytical platforms such as Hadoop, cloud, and Splunk. For more than 40 years customers have turned to Syncsort's software and expertise to dramatically improve performance of their data processing environments, while reducing hardware and labor costs. Experience Syncsort at http://www.syncsort.com .
About Big Data Quarterly
Big Data Quarterly is a new magazine and digital resource, from the editors of Database Trends and Applications (DBTA) magazine, designed to reach information management and business professionals who are looking to leverage big data in organizations of all kinds.
